daily_summary.headline: Exciting Day for Space Enthusiasts: GPS III Launch and Aurora Opportunities!

top_events.title: SpaceX Falcon 9 GPS III SV09 Launch
top_events.description: Launch of the GPS III SV09 satellite by SpaceX, enhancing global navigation capabilities.
top_events.action: Watch live stream and follow updates.

top_events.title: Aurora Viewing Opportunity
top_events.description: Potential aurora activity with a Kp index of 4.67, visible at high latitudes.
top_events.action: Check local conditions and prepare for aurora viewing.

top_events.title: Rocket Lab Electron Launch
top_events.description: Rocket Lab's Electron rocket launching the NeonSat-1A for Earth observation.
top_events.action: Follow live stream and mission updates.

opportunities.recommendation: Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
